footnotes: (H'a Mim) Hizi harufi mbili katika harufi za alifbete zilio fungulia Sura hii kama ilivyo ada ya Qur'ani katika Sura nyingi, ili kuzindua watu watanabahi, na pia kuonyesha dalili ya muujiza wa Qur'ani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
